channel.title: V2.4b Patch Notes
channel.description:
## This is an extension of v2.4a
![news-v24-animated|477x182](upload://1Qg5kim69mecCfkab3jfjvHsk63.gif)
https://forum.imperium42.com/t/v2-4-a-patch-notes/78603
____________________
## v2.4.0b - Hotfixes
Fixed many - but not all new bugs. Note that test realm was fixed for expediency, so let us know if some of what's listed isn't true:
* Fixed Chinese UI issues where you couldn't play or create a game. * Fixed some game over issues with winners and the winners display. * *Possible* fix of redirection visual bug. * Fixed "NoClass" bug for Kings - may ripple to other fixes (it wasn't just end-game). * End-screen and winners should now show specific types of Kings. * Pretender and Neut King should now be able to win. * Sellsword can now win with evil * Sorc is now immune to bleeding. * Royal Blood has returned to royal classes, fixing several abilities. * Pretender's Ballot Mixing abil should now work properly. * Inquisitor should have 3, unique Heretic targets (and *should* be able to win - please confirm with us if you win) * *Aristorcrat* typo fix. * Alch's Stoneskin is now usable after trial. * Single abilities are now centered. * Fixed abnormal "Psycho" classes. * Trollbox *should* now be able to use during trial (Please confirm if you try this). * Should have fixed Unique Mystics. * Fixed a chain of Hunter Retribution (Revenge) bugs. * The new Teemo+Mithras avatar now shows Teemo properly having a white chest :stuck_out_tongue: * Follow can no longer target the King * Follow abil now has memo that you can't target King * @ Guides: Fixed report bugs * Moved MVP panel over slightly to the right to show it's done on purpose for those that like a big chat box.
--Xblade https://discord.gg/tol
